contentrichtext.text: This is an alphabetical '''list of writers who are [[Japan]]ese''', or are famous for having written in the [[Japanese language]]. ''See also:'' [[Japanese literature]] Writers are listed by the native order of Japanese names, family name followed by given name to ensure consistency even though some writers are known for their western-ordered name. <center>List of Japanese writers by family name: [[List of Japanese authors:A|A]] - [[List of Japanese authors:B|B]] - [[List of Japanese authors:C|C]] - [[List of Japanese authors:D|D]] - [[List of Japanese authors:E|E]] - [[List of Japanese authors:F|F]] - [[List of Japanese authors:G|G]] - [[List of Japanese authors:H|H]] - [[List of Japanese authors:I|I]] - [[List of Japanese authors:J|J]] - [[List of Japanese authors:K|K]] - [[List of Japanese authors:M|M]] - [[List of Japanese authors:N|N]] - [[List of Japanese authors:O|O]] - [[List of Japanese authors:R|R]] - [[List of Japanese authors:S|S]] - [[List of Japanese authors:T|T]] - [[List of Japanese authors:U|U]] - [[List of Japanese authors:W|W]] - [[List of Japanese authors:Y|Y]] - [[List of Japanese authors:Z|Z]]</center> ==See also== * [[list of Japanese people]] * [[list of novelists]] * [[lists of authors]] {{Japanese language}} [[Category:Lists of Japanese writers| ]]
